alert.note: Alert for Juncos; Las Piedras; San Lorenzo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:33AM ADT until April 08 at 12:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Juncos County in Puerto Rico... Las Piedras County in Puerto Rico... San Lorenzo County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1145 AM AST. * At 933 AM AST, Excessive runoff from previous rains will continue to result in the risk for flash flooding along the warned area. Rivers and small streams are running well above normal levels. Additional rains through the morning hours are possible. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Excessive runoff and heavy rains producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
